title: Buff Kassadin not Nerf him

embed.description: Reminder ] The PBE is a testing ground for changes. What you see here may not reflect what you see in Patch Notes.

body: Riot Kassadin is struggling as an AP Carry, it is insanely difficult to carry as Kassadin his base numbers are already supbar and he has a significant ramp up time champs like Ahri and Fizz, Katarina and Zed can 100-0 Squishy Targets Kassadin can't do that unless he gets insanely fed from somewhere he can on 60-0 targets. You already made the empowerment stacks to 20 seconds from 12. You took away the slow which was 3 seconds and made it one second. Please bring back the old Kassadin's Riftwalk Damage which contained an 80% AP ratio.

replies.body:
Consider magic resist aaaaaaaaand...
He lost like 6 damage.
Its not much of a nerf but at the same time I don't think he needs a nerf.
Guess you all forgot that him and ryze are up for reworks next
its a scaling buff with a slight early game nerf. Overall its a buff...
they nerfed early I agree with this change he s a lane bully but they kept late game so it is fine

Although it is a nerf to him earlier on cause he has 10 damage removed at all ranks from his Q he has 10 damage added to his passive on the W at max level and assuming you actually make use of the fact that his w is an aa reset you actually have 10 more damage on your late game combo.
